summary: In March of 2011, three filmmakers disappeared in the Superstition Mountains of Arizona while documenting their search for the Lost Dutchman mine. Their bodies were never found... but their camera was.
cast: Ron Eagle D'Andre II|Adam Haley|Sage Howard|George E. Johnston|Nicholas Koenigs|Antony Puglisi|Andrew Simpson|Alan Sprague|Shelby Stehlin
keywords: superstition mountains arizona|superstition mountains|arizona territory|paranormal phenomena|supernatural power
title: Dark Mountain
